languages.text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Вольного Торговца! Горжусь тобой, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Далеко пойдешь, прямо как я!" {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело в лицо своей смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Вольного Торговца! Горжусь тобой, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Далеко пойдешь, прямо как я!" {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело в лицо своей смерти.{/n}

languages.text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Вольного Торговца! Горжусь тобой, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Далеко пойдешь, прямо как я!" {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело в лицо своей смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Here it is — the true face of the Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos smiles an excited, predatory smile in the face of his death.{/n}
"Here it is — the true face of the Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos smiles an excited, predatory smile in the face of his death.{/n}
"Here it is — the true face of the Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos smiles an excited, predatory smile on the face of his death.{/n}

"There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}
"There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Helo aquí, el verdadero rostro {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente! Me siento orgulloso de usted, {mf|novato|novata}. ¡Llegará lejos, igual que yo!». {n}La sonrisa de Calligos ante la muerte refleja su intensidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Helo aquí, el verdadero rostro {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente! Me siento orgulloso de usted, {mf|novato|novata}. ¡Llegará lejos, igual que yo!». {n}Calligos esboza una sonrisa de emoción y voracidad ante la perspectiva de su muerte.{/n}

languages.text: “没错！这才是真正的行商浪人该有的样子！我为你骄傲，新来的。你会出人头地的，就像我一样！”{n}当死亡迫近时，卡里戈斯脸上露出了热切的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错！这才是真正的行商浪人该有的样子！我为你骄傲，新来的。你会出人头地的，就像我一样！”{n}当死亡迫近时，卡里戈斯露出掠食者般的激动微笑。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous agissez enfin comme {mf|un véritable libre-marchand|une véritable libre-marchande} ! Je suis fier de vous, novice. Vous irez loin, comme moi ! » {n}s'exclame Calligos en faisant face à sa mort avec un sourire fougueux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous agissez enfin comme {mf|un véritable libre-marchand|une véritable libre-marchande} ! Je suis fier de vous, novice. Vous irez loin, comme moi ! » {n}s'exclame Calligos en faisant face à sa mort avec un sourire fougueux.{/n}

languages.text: 「これだ…自由開拓者 の素顔がここにある！誇りに思うぞ、新米よ。俺のように、お前もいろいろなところへ赴くことだろう！」{n}死を前にしたカリゴスは、その激しい気性を表したかのような表情を浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これだ…自由開拓者 の素顔がここにある！誇りに思うぞ、新米よ。俺のように、お前もいろいろなところへ赴くことだろう！」{n}死を前にしたカリゴスは、その激しい気性を表したかのような表情を浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: "Da ist es, das Gesicht {mf|eines wahren Freihändlers|einer wahren Freihändlerin}! Ich bin stolz auf Euch, neues Blut. Ihr werdet es weit bringen, genau wie ich!" {n}Calligos Lächeln im Angesichts des Todes zeugt von einem unerschütterlichen Geist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hier ist es, das wahre Gesicht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}! Ich bin stolz auf Euch, neues Blut. Ihr werdet es weit bringen, genau wie ich!" {n}Calligos grinst ein freudiges, räuberisches Lächeln auf dem Gesicht seines Todes.{/n}

languages.text: "İşte bu, gerçek Hür Tacir dediğin böyle görünür! Seninle gurur duyuyorum taze kan. Tıpkı benim gibi senin de bahtın açık olacak!" {n}Calligos'un ölümle burun burunayken bile gülümsemesi, âdeta hararetli ruhunun temsili.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There it is, the face of a true Rogue Trader! I'm proud of you, new blood. You will go places, just like me!" {n}Calligos's smile in the face of death is one of vehement spirit.{/n}
